text: Lyman Daniel Drake (1852–1932) was an American Major League Baseball outfielder. He played in two games for the 1884 Washington Nationals and recorded two hits in seven at-bats. When the Nationals folded before the end of the season, he joined the Fort Wayne Hoosiers of the Northwestern League for the rest of the season. ==Sources== Category:Major League Baseball outfielders Category:Washington Nationals (AA) players Category:Baseball players from Ohio Category:19th-century baseball players Category:Fort Wayne Hoosiers players Category:1852 births Category:1932 deaths
title: Lyman Drake
